requirements.description: Sentry collects only the data that you configure to be sent to Sentry.
This data typically includes software bugs (Errors), API calls, page loads, or similar requests and responses from your apps (Transactions).
Data collected by Sentry does not, by default, include any personally identifiable information (PII).

type.summary: Default Data Collection Exclusion of PII

requirements.description: You can augment the data sent to Sentry with additional context and metadata, including user names, email addresses, or by attaching files such as logs or crash reports.
Sentry processes the data you send to provide application monitoring services.
You would need to disclose and/or include in your app privacy policy all types of data you are collecting through your app, including data you are sending to Sentry.
